fixed_skill.desc: Deal Fire damage to 1 foe equal to 114.0/119.7/125.4% of Attack. 63.3/66.5/69.6% chance to inflict Burn for 2 turns.
fixed_skill.name: Agilao

innate_skill.desc: Deal Fire damage to all foes equal to 57.0/59.8/62.7% of Attack. 31.7/33.3/34.9% chance to inflict Burn for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Maragion

innate_skill.desc: Deal Physical damage to 1 foe equal to 129.1/135.6/142.0% of Attack.
innate_skill.name: Cornered Fang

innate_skill.desc: Increase Speed by 9. Decrease Defense by 4%.
innate_skill.name: Agility Master II

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical damage by 12.7%. After inflicting Burn, increase user's Attack by 22% for 2 turns.
passive_skill.name: Born of Flames

passive_skill.desc: Increase critical damage by 12.7%. After inflicting Burn, increase user's Attack by 25% for 2 turns.

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Fire damage to 1 foe equal to 360.0%/385.2%/410.4% of Attack.
